sentences.en: Entire roast chickens were sixty cents apiece.
He ceased to write at the age of sixty.
He drove at a speed of sixty miles per hour.
sentences.cn: 他以每小时60英里的速度开车.

sentences.en: He has now appeared in sixty odd films.
He is now well over sixty, but is still going strong.
sentences.cn: 他已六十多岁了, 可是还强壮得很.

sentences.en: He walked two hundred and sixty miles in eight days.
sentences.cn: 他在8天里走了260英里的路。

sentences.en: He's well over sixty, but he doesn't look at all old.
sentences.cn: 他早已年过60, 但毫不见老.

sentences.en: I'm sixty-two. I feel sixty-two, neither more nor less.
sentences.cn: 我现在62岁了，感觉自己也确实到这把年纪了。

sentences.en: In Rugby League, Australia trounced France by sixty points to four.
sentences.cn: 在联盟橄榄球赛上，澳大利亚队以60：4的比分大胜法国队。

sentences.en: She achieved a throw of sixty metres in the javelin event.
sentences.cn: 在掷标枪项目中,她掷了60米远.

sentences.en: She is still beautiful, and still pulling them in at sixty.
sentences.cn: 她依然很美丽，虽已年届60，对他们仍很有吸引力。

sentences.en: The cheque was made out for sixty pounds.
There are three hundred and sixty - five days in a year.
There are three hundred and sixty - five students in this school.
Twelve hours is the minimum, sixty hours the maximum.

words.tran_cn: 第六十的；六十分之一的
六十年代；六十多岁；六十到七十之间
